title:
Local ultrametric approximation of graph distance based Laplacian
  diffusion
abstract:
The error estimation for eigenvalues and eigenvectors of a small positive
symmetric perturbation on the spectrum of a graph Laplacian is related to
Gau{\ss} hypergeometric functions. Based on this, a heuristic polynomial-time
algorithm for finding an optimal locally ultrametric approximation of a
graph-distance power Laplacian matrix via the Vietoris-Rips graph based on the
graph distance function is proposed. In the end, the error in the solution to
the graph Laplacian heat equation given by extension to a locally p-adic
equation is estimated.
